statements: DELETE FROM weather_alerts WHERE alert_id = 5 AND severity = 'High';
DELETE FROM weather_alerts WHERE location = 'New York' AND alert_type = 'Tornado';
DELETE FROM user_notifications WHERE user_id = 100 AND notification_type = 'Weather Update';
DELETE FROM user_notifications WHERE user_id = 100 AND notification_type = 'emergency';
DELETE FROM UserNotifications WHERE user_id = 1 AND notification_id = 101;
DELETE FROM WeatherAlerts WHERE alert_level = 'Severe' AND alert_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM alert_subscribers WHERE s_category_id = 3 AND s_user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM alert_subscribers WHERE s_category_id = 2 AND s_user_id = 3;
